line_1: With such vile instruments their fortunes carve;
line_2: Rogues may grow fat, an Honest man dares starve.

line_1: Tho' ne'er so liberally we Authors carve.
line_2: Whilst even there, you praise with such Reserve,

line_1: Tho' ne'er so liberally we Authors carve.
line_2: As if you'd in the midst of Plenty starve,

line_1: Rewards for Worth, with lib'ral hand to carve,
line_2: To love the Arts, nor let the Artists starve;
